name: King Match Jewels
description:
King Match Jewels is amazing match-3 puzzle game, it makes you keep playing for FREE!


HOW TO PLAY
• Swap and Match 3 or more jewels of the same!
• Complete the level!

FEATURES
• 3 MATCH PUZZLE
• TONS OF UNIQUE LEVELS
• EASY AND FUN PLAY
• NO TIME LIMIT
• NO WIFI? NO PROBLEM!
